articles.author: Kisha Forde
articles.title: Writers Guild of America Slams Drew Barrymore for Talk Show Return Amid Strike - E! NEWS
articles.description: Amid the ongoing Writers Guild of America and SAG-AFTRA strikes, the WGA spoke out about Drew Barrymore returning for season four of her eponymous daytime talk show.
articles.content: "I want to be there to provide what writers do so well, which is a way to bring us together or help us make sense of the human experience," she wrote. "I hope for a resolve for everyone as soon as po… [+789 chars]

articles.author: Mostafa Salem, Hande Atay Alam
articles.title: American man rescued from cave in Turkey after being trapped for days - CNN
articles.description: An American caver has been rescued by emergency workers near Anamur, in southern Turkey, after he became stranded hundreds of meters underground earlier this month.
articles.content:

articles.author: Chelsey Cox, Adam Jeffery
articles.title: Photos: America marks the 22nd anniversary of the 9/11 terrorist attacks - CNBC
articles.description: Monday marks the 22nd anniversary of the Sept. 11 terror attacks — the deadliest terrorist attack on U.S. soil — which took the lives of nearly 3,000 people.
articles.content:
Monday marks the 22nd anniversary of the 9/11 terror attacks the deadliest such attack on U.S. soil which took the lives of nearly 3,000 people.
